body_html: Pretty much all the inflexibility is because we have to shoe-horn ourselves to use CuDNN for speed. We are working on letting people write LSTMCell + for-loops level RNN code that has CuDNN speeds (we are writing torch.jit optimization passes). If all goes well, you will see us reduce our dependency on CuDNN and make things more flexible in the next major release.
